languages.text: {n}Испуганно дернувшись, Идира смотрит на вас опухшими глазами, пытаясь выдавить из себя улыбку.{/n} "А, Лорд-капитан, это вы? Думала, очередной шепоток подкрался..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Испуганно дернувшись, Идира смотрит на вас опухшими глазами, пытаясь выдавить из себя улыбку.{/n} "А, Лорд-капитан, это вы? Думала, очередной шепоток подкрался..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Flinching in fright, Idira looks at you with wide eyes and tries to muster a smile.{/n} "Ah, Lord Captain, it's you. I thought it was another voice creeping into my head..."
languages.original_text: {n}Испуганно дернувшись, Идира смотрит на вас опухшими глазами, пытаясь выдавить из себя улыбку.{/n} "А, Лорд-капитан, это вы? Думала, очередной шепоток подкрался..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Flinching in fright, Idira looks at you with wide eyes and tries to muster a smile.{/n} "Ah, Lord Captain, it's you. I thought it was another voice creeping into my head..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉惊恐地颤抖着，瞪大眼睛看着你，努力挤出了个笑容。{/n}“啊，原来是你，舰长大人。我还以为是另一个声音钻进了我的脑子……”
languages.original_text: {n}Flinching in fright, Idira looks at you with wide eyes and tries to muster a smile.{/n} "Ah, Lord Captain, it's you. I thought it was another voice creeping into my head..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉惊恐地颤抖着，瞪大眼睛看着你，努力挤出了个笑容。{/n}“啊，原来是你，舰长大人。我还以为是另一个声音钻进了我的脑子……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Flinching in fright, Idira looks at you with wide eyes and tries to muster a smile.{/n} "Ah, Lord Captain, it's you. I thought it was another voice creeping into my head..."

languages.text: {n}Encogida de miedo, Idira te mira ojiplática e intenta esbozar una sonrisa.{/n} «Ah, Lord Capitán, es usted. Pensé que otra voz se estaba colando en mi cabeza...».
languages.original_text: {n}Flinching in fright, Idira looks at you with wide eyes and tries to muster a smile.{/n} "Ah, Lord Captain, it's you. I thought it was another voice creeping into my head..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Encogida de miedo, Idira te mira ojiplática e intenta esbozar una sonrisa.{/n} «Ah, Lord Capitán, es usted. Pensé que otra voz se estaba colando en mi cabeza...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}怯えてたじろぐイディラは、目を見開いてあなたを見つめ、笑顔を作ろうとする。{/n}「ああ、ロード・キャプテン、あなただったの。頭に忍び込んでくる別の声かと思ったわ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Flinching in fright, Idira looks at you with wide eyes and tries to muster a smile.{/n} "Ah, Lord Captain, it's you. I thought it was another voice creeping into my head..."

traits.locale_text: {n}怯えてたじろぐイディラは、目を見開いてあなたを見つめ、笑顔を作ろうとする。{/n}「ああ、ロード・キャプテン、あなただったの。頭に忍び込んでくる別の声かと思ったわ…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira schreckt verängstigt zurück, blickt dich mit weit aufgerissenen Augen an und lächelt gequält.{/n} "Ah, Lord Captain, Ihr seid es. Ich dachte, mir sei eine andere Stimme in den Kopf gekrochen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Flinching in fright, Idira looks at you with wide eyes and tries to muster a smile.{/n} "Ah, Lord Captain, it's you. I thought it was another voice creeping into my head..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schreckt verängstigt zurück, blickt dich mit weit aufgerissenen Augen an und lächelt gequält.{/n} "Ah, Lord Captain, Ihr seid es. Ich dachte, mir sei eine andere Stimme in den Kopf gekrochen ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira écarquille les yeux et tressaille en vous voyant approcher, mais essaie malgré tout d'afficher un sourire.{/n} « Ah, c'est vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'ai cru que c'était une autre voix qui s'était glissée dans ma tête... »
languages.original_text: {n}Flinching in fright, Idira looks at you with wide eyes and tries to muster a smile.{/n} "Ah, Lord Captain, it's you. I thought it was another voice creeping into my head..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira écarquille les yeux et tressaille en vous voyant approcher, mais essaie malgré tout d'afficher un sourire.{/n} « Ah, c'est vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'ai cru que c'était une autre voix qui s'était glissée dans ma tête... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Korkudan yüzü buruşan İdira, tüm dikkatiyle sana bakarak gülümsemeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, senmişsin. Sesini sinsice zihnime giren başka bir sesle karıştırdım."
languages.original_text: {n}Flinching in fright, Idira looks at you with wide eyes and tries to muster a smile.{/n} "Ah, Lord Captain, it's you. I thought it was another voice creeping into my head..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Korkuyla yüzü buruşan İdira, tüm dikkatiyle sana bakarak gülümsemeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Ah... Lord Kaptan, senmişsin. Sesini sinsice zihnime giren başka bir sesle karıştırdım."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
